code: private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream oos) throws IOException {     if (schema == null) {         oos.writeBoolean(false).     } else {         oos.writeBoolean(true).         oos.writeUTF(schema.toString(false)).     } }

private void readObject(ObjectInputStream ois) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException {     if (ois.readBoolean()) {         String schema = ois.readUTF().         this.schema = new Parser().parse(schema).     } else {         this.schema = null.     } }
